title: Event Calendar | What's On in Queenstown
description: Queenstown has many fun-filled events throughout the year, from festivals to sporting events and markets. View all upcoming events in Queenstown.

title: Submit an Event | Queenstown, NZ | Official Website
description: List your event on the official QueenstownNZ.nz website for free. Events must take place in Queenstown and be open to the public.
